title: Here's a list of 20 articles on multimodal entailment and related topics up to 2021

container-title: **"Visual and Linguistic Semantic Integration in Multimodal Neural Machine Translation"** - Specia, Lucia, et al

title: **"Multimodal Machine Translation with Reinforcement Learning"** - Elliott, Desmond, et al

container-title: **"Multimodal Neural Machine Translation: Incorporating Vision into Machine Translation"** - Calixto, Iacer, et al

title: **"Learning Multimodal Representations for Visual Question Answering"** - Antol, Stanislaw, et al
**"Multimodal Compact Bilinear Pooling for Visual Question Answering and Visual Grounding"** - Fukui, Akira, et al
**"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis: Addressing Key Issues and Setting Up the Baselines"** - Poria, Soujanya, et al
**"Multimodal Deep Learning for Robust RGB-D Object Recognition"** - Eitel, Andreas, et al
**"Multimodal Representation Learning: A Survey"** - Baltrušaitis, Tadas, et al
**"Visual Entailment: A Novel Task for Fine-Grained Image Understanding"** - Xie, Ning, et al
**"Multimodal Neural Language Models"** - Kiros, Ryan, et al
**"Multimodal Machine Translation with Embedding Prediction"** - Hitschler, Julian, et al
**"Multimodal Transformer Networks for End-to-End Video-Grounded Dialogue Systems"** - Le, Hieu, et al

author.literal: **"Multimodal Neural Architecture Search"** - Perez-Rua, Juan-Manuel, et al.

title: **"Multimodal Emotion Recognition from Speech and Text"** - Yoon, Seunghyun, et al
**"Multimodal Attention for Neural Machine Translation"** - Libovický, Jindřich, et al
**"Multimodal Language Analysis in the Wild: CMU-MOSEI Dataset and Interpretable Dynamic Fusion Graph"** - Zadeh, Amir, et al
**"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis to Explore the Structure of Emotions"** - Zadeh, Amir, et al
**"Multimodal Transformer for Unaligned Multimodal Language Sequences"** - Tsai, Yao-Hung Hubert, et al
**"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis Using Hierarchical Fusion with Context Modeling"** - Poria, Soujanya, et al

These articles cover a range of topics within multimodal entailment, including multimodal machine translation, visual question answering, sentiment analysis, and representation learning. They provide a comprehensive overview of the field and its various applications
